objects.text:
• Japanese Quartz Movement
• Stainless Steel Construction
• Water Resistant 30M

product_details.description: ⌚Movement: Japanese imported quartz analog movement and battery, provide precise time and long-term running. The watch can be used for more than 1 years. ⌚Material: The strap is made of stainless steel, comfortable and soft and breathable. Mineral glasses, 304 steel case, Suit for all kinds of occasions. ⌚Sports chronograph: Multifunctional sub-dial can work, chronograph, calendar, run seconds. Provide you with multi-function purpose use. ⌚3ATM waterproof: This watch is waterproof 30m, can withstand daily splash or short immersion in water, but not swimming and showering, diving or snorkeling. ☎After sales service: Each product has 1-year after sales service. If you have any questions about the product, please contact me immediately and we will give you a satisfactory solution. Item width - 4.2 centimeters ** Clasp type - Push Button Foldover Clasp With Safety ** Country of Origin - China **

banner_details:
The banner features a polished layout promoting a luxury timepiece. It is visually divided into two vertical halves: the left side holds all textual content while the product image occupies the right. The background features layered dark gradients and subtle geometric details that enhance sophistication. The top-left includes a bold headline (`heading`) in a futuristic sans-serif font, followed by a sleek subheading (`subheading`) in a muted gray tone. Beneath it is a list of features (`description`) laid out with bullet points. A bold price tag (`price`) stands prominently to attract attention. At the bottom is a high-contrast call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) reading “Shop Now”. The product image (`product_image`) is slightly diagonal, exuding elegance and premium quality.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: #1A1A1A  
- Charcoal Gray: #2D2D2D  
- Light Gray: #A0A0A0  
- Pure White: #FFFFFF  
- Steel Accent: #444444  
- Button Text: #1A1A1A
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern wristwatch with a monochromatic, metallic aesthetic. The primary color palette includes deep graphite black (#1A1A1A), brushed steel gray (#636363), and chrome silver (#C0C0C0), blending smoothly across the watch face and body. The dial uses a gradient from dark gray at the edges to a lighter silver at the center, enhancing depth and sophistication. Polished highlights on the watch frame and strap reflect light subtly, adding contrast. These metallic tones emphasize luxury and precision. For an advertisement banner, this refined palette can be complemented with minimalist accents like white (#FFFFFF) or electric blue (#007BFF).
